text: "What If" is a 2000 song by Creed and is the second single from their second studio album Human Clay. It was used in the 2000 movie Scream 3. It went to number 3 on the Billboard Mainstream Rock chart. == References == Category:2000 songs Category:Creed (band) songs Category:Daughtry (band) songs
title: What If (Creed song)
